text: Quick question, if we're previewing an HTML template partial which includes `{{require_css('example.css')}}`  Should we see those styles included in the live preview? or would they not show up since there's not `{{standard_header_includes}}` in the partial?
If you are previewing just the partial, I don’t believe you’d see those styles. Like you said `require` adds to the header or footer includes based on if js/css
